title_main: Track your package from start to end!
title_sub: We will help you fall asleep calmly because you will always know the whereabouts of the parcel.
Icon1Text: Enter the parcel code in the required field and click 'Find immediately'
Icon2Text: Your package has been found! Click 'follow', so it always visible in the window 'My parcels'
Icon3Text: If you are package sender, please click Create Package and fill in all the necessary fields, so you and recipient could track this.
Icon4Text: Update status if necessary, to follow statistics and route your package.
